flagshipEvents.name: CodeStorm
flagshipEvents.description: Gear up for an electrifying coding challenge at CODESTORM! Put your problem-solving skills to the test in two intense rounds of competition, where logic, speed, and efficiency determine the best coders. Round 1: Take on four challenging coding problems designed to push your analytical and problem-solving abilities to the limit. Only the top contenders will make it to the next stage. Round 2: The ultimate test of optimization and efficiency awaits! Compete against the best to achieve the highest score and prove your coding excellence.

flagshipEvents.name: Brand-IT
flagshipEvents.description: Brand IT is a competition designed to unleash participants' creativity through the art of designing. It is a contest where using the best design skills to forge a unique brand kit turns into reality. Round 1: 'Design Your Brand Kit' - Participants pick their brand category from the spectrum of options provided and craft a brand kit within 35 hours, consisting of a logo, color palette, typography, packaging, and more. Round 2: 'Present Your Brand' - Shortlisted teams will take turns presenting their brand kits to the panel of judges. The most creative and visually compelling brand kit will be declared the winner.

flagshipEvents.name: Civicture
flagshipEvents.description: Civicture is a dynamic competition designed to provide a platform for participants to showcase their creativity, technical expertise, and problem-solving skills. Engineering brilliance meets architectural creativity to shape the future. Round 1: Participants face around 20 multiple-choice questions. Each question has four visual options (images or emojis). Teams with the highest points proceed. Round 2: Participants receive a set of instructions and are required to construct a model based on those instructions and demonstrate their completed model to a panel of judges.

flagshipEvents.name: AvionX
flagshipEvents.description: Immerse yourself in the world of aerospace with AvionX! Challenge yourself with aviation-themed tasks, solve mysteries, and design critical aerospace components in a battle of intellect, creativity, and teamwork. Round 1: A fun role-play activity where participants act as detectives, solving an aviation-themed mystery. Round 2: 'Fusion of Ideas' - Work within your domain to refine and develop key components of an aerospace system. Round 3: 'The Grand Assembly' - Engineers from different domains come together to create a complete aerospace system.

flagshipEvents.name: Hack-A-Maze
flagshipEvents.description: Join the excitement of racing with Hack-A-Maze! Build a robot to follow the line track—it's your own personal F1 race with bots. Take on the Line Follower challenge and get your bot to the finish line. Round 1: Get your bot through the easier track quickly and accurately as a warm-up. Round 2: Follow the track to the exit point, passing all checkpoints for the most points. Time is key in both rounds.

flagshipEvents.name: Mock Placements
flagshipEvents.description: Step into the world of campus placements through a simulated hiring process. Round 1: A comprehensive assessment testing logical reasoning, mathematical aptitude, and subject knowledge. IT participants may also face an online coding challenge. Round 2: Shortlisted candidates advance to face-to-face Technical & HR Interviews to demonstrate technical knowledge, problem-solving, communication, and leadership potential. Feedback is provided post-interview.

flagshipEvents.name: Silic-O-Hack
flagshipEvents.description: Silic-O-Hack challenges participants to transform innovative ideas into practical solutions. Round 1: 'Analysis & Troubleshooting' - Participants troubleshoot and repair faulty circuits, focusing on components like resistors, capacitors, transistors, MOSFETs, and op-amps. Round 2: 'Ideation & Design' - Shortlisted participants have 24 hours to develop a solution using TinkerCAD based on a problem statement and present it to an expert panel.

flagshipEvents.name: Mechronins
flagshipEvents.description: A test of skill, strategy, and innovation where mechanical brilliance takes center stage. Round 1: 'Mech Mystery' - Mechanical puzzles testing strategy and ingenuity. Round 2: 'Machine Run 2.0' - Team adventure to solve puzzles and uncover hidden clues. Round 3: 'Design Innovators Challenge' - Tackle design problem statements, develop solutions, and present futuristic concepts to judges.

flagshipEvents.name: Summit
flagshipEvents.description: A Student Parliament for knowledge sharing, problem-solving, and networking. Each round is an elimination round. Panel Discussion: Insightful discussion on a thought-provoking topic held prior to the main event. Preliminary Round: Teams present solutions virtually before the main event. Round 1: Advance problem statement analysis presented via PowerPoint. Round 2: Presentation of innovative ideas following the completion of Round 1.

flagshipEvents.name: Laser Tag
flagshipEvents.description: An action-packed battle where strategy meets adrenaline. Navigate a darkened arena armed with infrared guns and outscore opponents in this futuristic combat game. Gear up, strategize, and dominate the battlefield!

generalEvents.name: Brain Bids 2.0
generalEvents.description: A fusion of quizzing and strategic bidding where your intellect is your currency. Participants bid on questions and outthink opponents in a battle of strategy. Round 1: 'Bid Your Knowledge' - Bid points to earn the right to answer. Round 2: Inspired by 'Kaun Banega Crorepati', a race against time to earn points.

generalEvents.name: Data Quest
generalEvents.description: A competition showcasing data analytics, problem-solving, and visualization skills. Round 1: 'Data Cleaning & Dashboard Creation' - Online 5-hour task cleaning datasets, solving SQL challenges, and creating insight-driven dashboards. Round 2: 'Presentation' - Top teams present their data cleaning process, SQL solutions, and key insights to judges.

generalEvents.name: The Time Traveler's Code
generalEvents.description: History is scrambled! Decode encrypted messages and solve legendary mysteries using AI to rebuild the timeline. Round 1: Offline puzzles inspired by movies, games, and history to find clues and fix glitches. Round 2: Overnight challenge using basic AI techniques on corrupted datasets to restore the timeline and present solutions to judges.

generalEvents.name: Think Tank
generalEvents.description: An IoT-based event testing strategic thinking. Round 1: 'Trade with Tinkercad' - Design solutions using simulation software while managing a limited point system for components and lifelines. Round 2: 'Bid to Win' - Guess a hidden company's name from its story; bidding begins if no one guesses correctly. Final scores are influenced by real-time stock performance.

generalEvents.name: Synthetic Intelligence
generalEvents.description: A competition to test prompt engineering skills against top AI enthusiasts. This single-round event challenges teams to solve complex problems involving contradictions and numerical reasoning using models like GPT-4 or Claude. Success depends on selection of the right AI model and refining prompts within the given time.

generalEvents.name: Tantragnyana Tarka
generalEvents.description: A unique Kannada event bridging cultural heritage and modern technology through decoding and debating. Round 1: 'Kannada Decode' - Cracking cryptic Kannada phrases and proverbs using encoding techniques. Round 2: 'Debate' - A stimulating discussion in Kannada focused on Bengaluru's technological evolution.

generalEvents.name: Escape Room: UVCE Edition
generalEvents.description: The ultimate UVCE-themed detective challenge! Teams of 3-4 hunt for hidden clues and solve mind-bending puzzles while racing against the clock. Only the sharpest minds will claim exclusive prizes.

generalEvents.name: IPL Auction
generalEvents.description: A blend of strategy and real-world IPL dynamics. Teams battle through bidding wars and strategic retention. Round 1: 'IPL Knockout Quiz' - Thrilling quiz covering all past seasons. Round 2: 'Panel Auction' - Qualified teams compete in panels with an intense shortlisting process. Round 3: 'Mega Auction' - Ultimate auction streamed live on YouTube with real-time transaction displays.

gamingEvents.name: BGMI Tournament
gamingEvents.description: A Battle Royale tournament where the number of rounds depends on registration volume. Groups are formed if teams exceed 16, with the top 12 qualifying for the final. There are 3 matches per group and 5 final matches, totaling 11 matches, with results based on table ranking.

gamingEvents.name: Valorant Tournament
gamingEvents.description: Tactical combat tournament to test squad skills and strategy. Prove you are a sharpshooter or strategic mastermind to claim glory. Format: Best of 1 until top 4, Best of 3 until top 2, and a Best of 5 final match.

gamingEvents.name: Chess Mania
gamingEvents.description: A 3-round online chess tournament where wins contribute to the points table. Round 1: Chess 960 in an Arena system (Clock 3+2) for 1 hour. Round 2: Standard in an Arena system (Clock 5+0) for 1 hour. Round 3: Standard Finals (Clock 10+0) with 1 match per player.
